00053 public:

00062         NoCutoff = 0,
00066         CutoffNonPeriodic = 1,
00071         CutoffPeriodic = 2,
00072     };
00073     /*
00074      * Create a GBSAOBCForce.
00075      */
00076     GBSAOBCForce();
00080     int getNumParticles() const {
00081         return particles.size();
00082     }
00092     int addParticle(double charge, double radius, double scalingFactor);
00101     void getParticleParameters(int index, double& charge, double& radius, double& scalingFactor) const;
00110     void setParticleParameters(int index, double charge, double radius, double scalingFactor);
00114     double getSolventDielectric() const {
00115         return solventDielectric;
00116     }
00120     void setSolventDielectric(double dielectric) {
00121         solventDielectric = dielectric;
00122     }
00126     double getSoluteDielectric() const {
00127         return soluteDielectric;
00128     }

00133         soluteDielectric = dielectric;
00134     }

00149     double getCutoffDistance() const;
00156     void setCutoffDistance(double distance);
00168     void updateParametersInContext(Context& context);
00169 protected:

00171 private:
00172     class ParticleInfo;

00182 class GBSAOBCForce::ParticleInfo {
00183 public:
00184     double charge, radius, scalingFactor;
00185     ParticleInfo() {
